Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 209C.proposition: This Court has subject matter jurisdiction over this action under Massachusetts law and the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act, Mass. Gen. Laws ch. 209C, and personal jurisdiction over the parties because the children and the parties reside in this Commonwealth and because the parties are already before this Court on the existing custody order entered in this Court on May 14, 2021.
